name: smoltoken
description: High-performance BPE tokenizer library built from scratch in Rust and Python, inspired by OpenAI's tiktoken, achieving performance comparable to Hugging Face's tokenizers
highlights: Developed from scratch with performance comparable to industry standards
Set up CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for automated building and distribution

name: voiceflow
description: AI voice agent platform for debt collection, integrating real-time STT, LLM, and TTS pipelines with automated testing and self-improving framework
highlights: Built complete platform with FastAPI backend, React dashboards, and PostgreSQL for contact & call management
Developed automated testing & self-improving framework that generates synthetic defaulter personas and applies feedback loops
Integrated telephony with LiveKit for outbound calls using Twilio
